Dwell is the leading magazine for contemporary home design. We feature forward-looking homes by telling the stories of the people who live in them. Our articles range from tours of houses that present new ideas in architecture and interior design, as well as guides for building, renovating, and outfitting your own space. 

Features of our app:

• Read each issue of our magazine, cover to cover, and browse past issues.
• Download issue for offline reading and clip stories to save or share.

Highlights include:

• Before & After: Our series all about renovations—from dramatic transformations to careful restorations of classics.
• Budget Breakdown: How much did that home really cost to build? We show you where owners decided to save and splurge.
• Tiny Houses: Less is truly more in these homes that demonstrate the value of living large in small spaces.
• Prefab Homes: We show how prefabrication and modular construction can mean fast build times and lighter environmental impact.
• The Backyard House: From rental apartments to granny flats, accessory dwelling units make more sense than ever. We feature some of the best as well as resources for building your own.
• Off the Grid: From houses on remote sites and cleverly built cabins to amazing Airstreams and ingenious van conversions, these homes venture further than most.
